column4: can anyone help me with my 3g modem? i can't connect anymore. i'm trying sakis 3g atm, but it doesn't work... neither does wvdial ("invalid dial command"). I need help. i need that connection to work 2morrow...
Huawei EM770 - and it is recognized as such...
Did you check to see if there were any newer drivers available?
how can i do that apart from google?
Is the modem built into a laptop?
What is the manufacturer/model of the laptop>?
Scroll down to huawei081126.sh.zip on this site...
ok, i installed the script and rebooted - no change...
I'm not sure then.  I've done some Google searches, but can't find any good explanation or solution..
what's really weird is, is that wvdial returns "invalid dial command"...
